pkgmetadata.longdescription: # flake8-assert-msgflake8 plugin which forbids assert statements without messages.## Installation`pip install flake8-assert-msg`## flake8 codes| Code | Description ||--------|-------------------------|| ASS001 | do not use bare asserts |## RationaleThis ensures that assertions have clear messages for failures. Adding a message to an assertion also acts as documentation for why the assertion is present.## As a pre-commit hookSee [pre-commit](https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit) for instructionsSample `.pre-commit-config.yaml`:```yaml- repo: https://gitlab.com/pycqa/flake8 rev: 3.8.1 hooks: - id: flake8 additional_dependencies: [flake8-assert-msg==1.1.1]```## Acknowledgements- https://github.com/asottile/flake8-walrus used as a template
